content: To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message instructing users to add the product URL to the allow list to start the embedding process. It appears in a dialog or settings page, specifically in a category header, and provides context for translators familiar with content security policies (CSP).

usage.context:
<>
 <CategoryHeader>
 {t("CSPHeader", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </CategoryHeader>
 <Container className="description-holder">
 {t("CSPDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 <HelpButton
 className="csp-helpbutton"
 offsetRight={0}
 size={12}
 tooltipContent={<Text fontSize="12px">{t("CSPHelp")}</Text>}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "لتضمين {{productName}} بشكل آمن كإطار iframe في موقع ويب، قم بإضافة عنوان URL الخاص به إلى قائمة السماح لديك" is too literal and doesn't convey the original meaning of 'to start the embedding process'. A better translation would focus on initiating the embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: للبدء في عملية تضمين {{productName}}، أضف عنوان URL الخاص به إلى قائمة السماح لديك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'بشكل آمن كإطار iframe' (as a secure iframe) is overly technical and not necessary for the target audience.  The original English doesn't mention 'iframe'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'كإطار iframe' as it's unnecessary and adds technical jargon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "təhlükəsiz şəkildə yerləşdirmək" (in an unsafe way) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'embedding'. Embedding implies integrating, not necessarily in an unsafe manner. The English sentence implies a secure integration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more neutral term like "birgələşdirilmiş" (integrated) or "daxil edilmiş" (included). A possible correction would be: "{{productName}}-i vebsaytda birgələşdirilmiş üçün onun URL-ni icazələr siyahısına əlavə edin."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a colon (:) after 'icazələr siyahısına', which is not standard Azerbaijani punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon: "{{productName}}-i vebsaytda birgələşdirilmiş üçün onun URL-ni icazələr siyahısına əlavə edin."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "За безопасно вграждане на {{productName}} като iframe в уебсайт, добавете URL адреса му към вашия списък с разрешени." implies embedding via iframe, which isn't explicitly stated in the English original. While iframe embedding is a common use case, the original text is broader and doesn't restrict it to iframes. A more accurate translation would avoid this assumption.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За да стартирате процеса на вграждане, добавете URL адреса на {{productName}} към вашия списък с разрешени.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation focuses on embedding as an iframe and mentions 'webové stránky' which isn't explicitly mentioned in the English original. The English implies a more general 'starting the embedding process'. While technically correct, it adds unnecessary specificity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chcete-li zahájit proces vkládání, přidejte URL {{productName}} do seznamu povolených adres.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a slightly more formal tone than the English original. Consider adjusting for a more casual feel if appropriate for the product’s target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Není potřeba žádná konkrétní úprava, ale zvažte, zda by formálnější tón byl pro daný produkt vhodný.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To start the embedding process' has been translated as 'Um {{productName}} sicher als iFrame in eine Website einzubetten'. While not entirely wrong, it's a more complex phrasing than the original. The original is a straightforward instruction to add the URL to the allow list.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um den Einbettungsprozess zu starten, fügen Sie die URL zu Ihrer Zulassungsliste hinzu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original text implies a general 'embedding process'. The translation specifically mentions 'iFrame', which might not always be the intended embedding method.  This makes it less general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um die Einbettung zu starten, fügen Sie die URL zu Ihrer Zulassungsliste hinzu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Για να ενσωματώσετε με ασφάλεια το {{productName}} ως iframe σε έναν ιστότοπο, προσθέστε τη διεύθυνση URL του στη λίστα αδειών σας' is overly specific. The English text refers to 'embedding process' which is more general than embedding as an iframe.  It introduces concepts (iframe, website) not explicitly mentioned in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Για να ξεκινήσετε τη διαδικασία ενσωμάτωσης, προσθέστε τη διεύθυνση URL του {{productName}} στη λίστα αδειών σας.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Para incrustar {{productName}} de forma segura como iframe en un sitio web, añada su URL a la lista de direcciones permitidas." is too literal and adds unnecessary detail. While technically correct, it's overly technical for the intended audience. The original implies a simple addition to an allow list, while the translation suggests embedding as an iframe, which might not be what the user needs to know.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para iniciar el proceso de integración, añada la URL de {{productName}} a la lista de direcciones permitidas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "de forma segura como iframe en un sitio web" is a bit clunky in Spanish. It feels like an added detail that could be removed without losing meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Removing the unnecessary details makes the sentence flow better.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Lisää {{productName}}:n URL' could be improved for clarity. While grammatically not incorrect, it's slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Lisää {{productName}}-osoite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lisää {{productName}}-osoite

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the colon after '{{productName}}' is technically correct, it's preferable to use a hyphen in this context, as it's referring to a URL and not an attribute-value pair.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lisää {{productName}}-osoite

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pour intégrer {{productName}} en toute sécurité sous la forme de cadre intégré dans un site web' is a more elaborate explanation than the original English, which simply states 'To start the embedding process'. While technically correct, it adds unnecessary detail.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pour démarrer le processus d'intégration, ajoutez l'URL de {{productName}} à votre liste d'autorisations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation introduces 'sous la forme de cadre intégré dans un site web'.  The English doesn't mention frames specifically. Maintaining this level of detail might confuse users. While not strictly incorrect, the more direct translation aligns better with the original intention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'sous la forme de cadre intégré dans un site web'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "անվտանգ ներկառուցելու համար" (to safely embed) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list.' It implies a security measure rather than simply adding to a list. A more accurate translation would focus on the action of adding the URL to the allow list.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like: "{{productName}}-ը iframe վեբկայքում գործարկելու համար, ավելացրեք նրա URL-ը ձեր թույլտվությունների ցանկում:" (To run {{productName}} in an iframe website, add its URL to your allow list.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ձեր թույլտվությունների ցանկում:" ends with a colon. It's generally better to end a sentence with a period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change the colon to a period: "ձեր թույլտվությունների ցանկում".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Per incorporare {{productName}} come iframe in un sito web in modo sicuro" introduces the concept of an iframe, which isn't explicitly mentioned in the English source. The English text simply refers to adding the URL to an allow list for embedding, not necessarily through an iframe.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per avviare il processo di incorporamento, aggiungi l'URL di {{productName}} all'elenco consentiti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation adds the phrase "in modo sicuro" which isn't present in the original English. While not inherently incorrect, it deviates from the original and potentially adds unnecessary context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per avviare il processo di incorporamento, aggiungi l'URL di {{productName}} all'elenco consentiti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'To start the embedding process' is not fully captured by the Japanese translation 'ウェブサイトに埋め込むには'. While '埋め込むには' translates to 'to embed', it lacks the nuance of 'to start the embedding process'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ウェブサイトに{{productName}}を安全に埋め込むための初期設定として、そのURLを許可リストに追加してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While functionally correct, the phrase 'そのURLを許可リストに追加してください' is slightly less natural in Japanese. It could be improved for smoother reading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: そのURLを許可リストに追加してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '웹사이트에 {{productName}}를 iframe으로 안전하게 임베드하려면 해당 URL을 허용 목록에 추가하세요' implies embedding via iframe, whereas the English 'To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list' is more general and doesn't specify iframe. It simply refers to embedding the URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 웹사이트에 {{productName}} URL을 임베드하려면 해당 URL을 허용 목록에 추가하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Lai tīmekļa vietnē {{productName}} droši iegultu kā iframe" is not a direct or clear translation of "To start the embedding process...".  The use of 'iframe' is specific and not necessarily implied in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lai sāktu iegūšanas procesu, pievienojiet {{productName}} URL savam atļauju sarakstam.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vietrādi' is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'URL' in this context. It seems like an attempt to convey a location, but is inaccurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation focuses on embedding the product as an iframe for security. The original English text simply states to add the URL to an allow list to 'start the embedding process', which is broader. The Dutch translation implies a specific security concern and framing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Om het inbeddingsproces te starten, voegt u de {{productName}} URL toe aan uw toestaan-lijst.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'voegt u de URL toe' is slightly formal. While grammatically correct, it could be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: voeg de URL toe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Aby bezpiecznie osadzić {{productName}} jako element iframe na swojej stronie internetowej, dodaj jego adres URL do swojej listy dozwolonych" is overly verbose and adds unnecessary details (specifically mentioning 'iframe'). The English text focuses on simply adding the URL to the allow list to start the embedding process. The Polish translation introduces a technical detail not present in the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby rozpocząć proces osadzania, dodaj adres URL {{productName}} do listy dozwolonych.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Para incorporar com segurança o {{productName}} como um iframe num Website, adicione o seu URL à sua lista de permissões." implies embedding within an iframe, which might not be the intended meaning of 'add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list'. A more direct translation of 'to start the embedding process' is needed. The English phrasing is broader and doesn't necessarily mean iframe embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para iniciar o processo de incorporação, adicione o URL do {{productName}} à sua lista de permissões.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'como um iframe num Website' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be more naturally expressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggested correction in the previous point addresses this.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Para incorporar com segurança o {{productName}} como um iframe em um site, adicione seu URL à sua lista de permissões' is too specific. The English phrase 'To start the embedding process' is more general and doesn't inherently imply embedding via iframe or security concerns. It just indicates the first step to begin embedding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para iniciar o processo de incorporação, adicione o URL do {{productName}} à sua lista de permissões.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Pentru a încorpora spațiul {{productName}} bazat pe iFrame într-o pagina web" is not a direct and natural translation of "To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list." While technically correct, it's overly literal and includes unnecessary details (iFrame, webpage).  A more natural translation would focus on the core meaning of starting the embedding process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a începe procesul de încorporare, adăugați adresa URL a {{productName}} la lista de permisiuni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translated text includes "într-o pagina web" which should be "într-o pagină web".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Într-o pagină web

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Чтобы безопасно встроить {{productName}} в качестве iframe в веб-сайт, добавьте его URL-адрес в список разрешенных" implies embedding via iframe, which might not be the intended method. The English version simply mentions 'embedding'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чтобы начать процесс встраивания {{productName}}, добавьте его URL-адрес в список разрешенных.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list' is not accurate. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' is an abbreviation for URL but its placement is awkward and unclear in Sinhala. A more natural translation would be to simply use 'ලිංක්' (link) or rephrase the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාවැද්දීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය ඇරඹීමට, ඉඩ දෙන ලැයිස්තුවට {{productName}} ලිංක් එක් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The abbreviation 'ඒ.ස.නි.' placed immediately after '{{productName}}' is visually jarring and disrupts the flow of the sentence. It needs spacing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාවැද්දීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය ඇරඹීමට, ඉඩ දෙන ලැයිස්තුවට {{productName}} ඒ.ස.නි. එක් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pokiaľ chcete bezpečne umiestniť {{productName}} na webovú stránku ako iframe, pridajte jeho URL do zoznamu povolených adries.' implies embedding as an iframe. The original English text refers to adding the URL to an allow list to *start* the embedding process, which is a more general step and not necessarily limited to iframes. The Slovak translation is too specific.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokiaľ chcete začať s procesom vkladania {{productName}}, pridajte jeho URL do zoznamu povolených adries.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing 'jeho URL' can be slightly improved for a more natural flow in Slovak.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: jeho adresy

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Če želite varno vdelati {{productName}} kot iframe na spletno mesto, dodajte njegov URL na seznam dovoljenih' is a bit too literal and doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'to start the embedding process'. 'Varno vdelati kot iframe na spletno mesto' implies a specific method (embedding as an iframe) which may not be the only way to embed. A more general translation is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če želite začeti postopek vdelave {{productName}}, dodajte njegov URL na seznam dovoljenih.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'njegov URL' which is grammatically correct but sounds slightly formal. A more common phrasing might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če želite začeti postopek vdelave {{productName}}, dodajte URL na seznam dovoljenih.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is too verbose and doesn't accurately reflect the simplicity of the original English sentence. "To start the embedding process" is not accurately conveyed by "'i bir web sitesine iframe olarak güvenli bir şekilde gömmek için".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 'i yerleştirmek için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "izin verilenler listenize ekleyin" is too formal and doesn't align with the informal tone of the original.  A more user-friendly equivalent is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: izinler listenize ekleyin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "To start the embedding process" is translated as "Щоб безпечно впровадити {{productName}} на вебсайті як вбудований фрейм". While not entirely incorrect, it's overly verbose and introduces the concept of a 'frame' which wasn't in the original. A more direct and simpler translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Щоб розпочати процес вбудовування...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "allow list" is translated as "списку дозволених". While technically correct, a more common and easier-to-understand phrasing might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: списку дозволів

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Để nhúng {{productName}} một cách an toàn dưới dạng iframe trong một trang web, hãy thêm URL của nó vào danh sách cho phép của bạn" doesn't directly convey the meaning of the English content "To start the embedding process, add the {{productName}} URL to the allow list." The Vietnamese translation includes 'iframe' and 'an toàn' (safe) which aren't present in the English, and it's more detailed than the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để bắt đầu quá trình nhúng, hãy thêm URL của {{productName}} vào danh sách cho phép.
